notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: MS, ZG and YW conceived the project. MS, QT, WZ, AHS, ZW, YB, YF, CZ, HW and PAS performed experiments. MS and QT analyzed most data. MS, ZG, JL, ZW, WX and YW provided critical intellectual input to the study and the manuscript preparation. MS, ZG, AHS and RE wrote the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
